stories.original_headline: Something fundamental about black holes may be changing
stories.original_summary: New observations reveal that the relationship between ultraviolet and X-ray light in quasars has changed over billions of years. This unexpected shift suggests the structure around supermassive black holes may evolve with time, challenging a decades-old assumption.
stories.fantasy_headline: Ancient Void Maws Might Be Changing Their Shape!
stories.fantasy_story: Master Astrologers observing distant star-lanterns have noticed the unseen glimmers shifting over eons. This strange discovery suggests that even the Great Void Maws might evolve, challenging ancient lore about their unchanging nature. It is a mystery for the ages.

stories.original_headline: A Christmas tree 80 light-years wide appears in space
stories.original_summary: This Christmas, astronomers are highlighting a spectacular region of space that looks remarkably like a glowing holiday tree. Known as NGC 2264, this distant star-forming region sits about 2,700 light-years away and is filled with newborn stars lighting up clouds of gas and dust. The stars form a tr
stories.fantasy_headline: Celestial Sages Discover Giant Star-Tree in the Sky Expanse!
stories.fantasy_story: Just in time for the Winter Solstice, the Celestial Sages have unveiled a wonder! Far in the Great Sky Expanse, a vast region of newborn sky-gems and shimmering mist appears like a colossal, glowing celebration tree. It is truly a magnificent sight.

stories.original_headline: Rodeo is an app for making plans with friends you already have
stories.original_summary: There are plenty of dating apps out there and apps that turn your chaos of work obligations into easily actionable lists. There is also a growing number of apps that help you make new friends. The pitch for Rodeo is a bit different in that it uses AI to help you schedule activities with your [â€¦]
stories.fantasy_headline: New Enchanted Scroll Helps Friends Plan Gatherings!
stories.fantasy_story: A clever new enchanted scroll has emerged from the Scribe's Guild! Unlike other scrolls that find new companions or organize tasks, this one employs a small Clever Spirit. It helps you perfectly orchestrate feasts and adventures with the companions you already hold dear.
